DOC.brief_summary: This follow-up cohort study 8 year old child bear preterm Seoul National University Children 's Hospital Korea 2008-2009 . The child visit outpatient clinic examination regard growth , obesity risk factor relate metabolic syndrome . The purpose study compare growth risk factor metabolic syndrome among child bear preterm child bear healthy term school age
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors Related Metabolic Syndrome School-aged Children Who Were Born Preterm
DOC.criteria: Very low birth weight infant and/or bear less 32 week gestation age Healthy term infant control group Parents child accept participation Major congenital anomaly Neuromuscular disease Chromosomal anomalies Patients receive growth hormone therapy Primary hypothyroidism
